trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.target: Si vous utilisez le module complémentaire Multi-Account Containers dans Firefox, essayez d’ajouter Mozilla VPN à vos conteneurs uniques. Vous pouvez même définir différents emplacements de serveur pour vos conteneurs uniques.
trans-unit.source: If you use the Multi-Account Containers add-on in Firefox, try adding Mozilla VPN to your unique containers. You can even set different server locations for your unique containers.

trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.source: Don’t use Multi-Account Containers? It’s a Firefox add-on that allows you to isolate your browsing for specific types of activities. For example, you can keep your online shopping data separate from your online banking data.

trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.source: With Mozilla VPN, you can set your news container to always route through a server location in your home country, making it even easier to protect your data while traveling.

trans-unit.target: Mozilla VPN dans le navigateur Firefox
trans-unit.source: Mozilla VPN in the Firefox browser
